name: The CSS special
description:
This slide is in stock and ready to go!

This one is my personal favourite spec. 59.5mm long with a recessed edge for comfort. 16.5mm internal diameter and 1mm sidewall, it is light and fast but still retains great tone.

Comes with our black velvet storage bag.

name: The Tone Hunter
description:
This slide is in stock and ready to go!

Now this simple, but stunning slide is a beauty. It's 1.5mm sidewall means it has bags of tone oozing from its polished finish. Slightly heavier than its little brother means it has a lot more presence on the strings. Huge tone, yet still very agile and useable.
This is a full length slide at 64mm and an internal diameter of 15.5mm. Perfect for guitar players with slimmer fingers and is a great slide on the forth finger, or perched on the first knuckle on your third finger.

Supplied with our black velvet storage bag.

name: The Wide Boy
description:
This slide is in stock and ready to go!

If you have larger fingers and struggle to find a slide that fits correctly, this could be the slide for you. With an internal diameter of 23mm the wide boy is a big ol' slide! Sidewall thickness of 1mm results in a bright tone and is very useable for a variety of slide styles.
It has a length intended for third finger users at 60mm, but is perfectly usable on the forth finger as a full slide. Also features the recessed edge meaning it is very comfortable and doesn't pinch the skin whilst playing.

As with all my slides, it comes with the black velvet storage bag.

name: The 'Light 'n Bright' Slide
description:
This slide is in stock and ready to go!

It features a slightly shorter cut length at 51.5mm intended for slide players who favour using their third finger. This slide is great for specific note playing and has a lovely light feel.

Featuring the 1mm thick sidewall which is thick enough to still have a good tone and sustain, but thin enough to feel very light on your finger for fast playing.
This slide has a 16.5mm internal diameter, so all of you with smaller fingers this is for you!
This simple slide is a speedy thang with great tone and playability. Don't fancy waiting for a custom order? This could be perfect for you.

It has a lovely, highly polished finish.

All slides come with a black velvet carry bag.

name: Your Custom Slide Journey starts here...
description:
This is stage one to your custom made brass slide journey. Before you hit the buy button you will need to make a few simple decisions and take a few measurements. I recommend you e-mail me first to discuss your order, but if you feel you are ready to buy then continue reading!

1. The main thing here is that I want to make sure the slide fits your finger perfectly. So simply measure the width of the widest part of your finger you wish to use the slide on. I recommend the use of verniers for this for accuracy, but if you don't have any to hand then a simple ruler should be fine. All done? Great, lets move on.

2. Now the customisation begins. There are a handful of options to think about. 
First of all, how thick would you like the sidewall of the slide? 
Super thin eg:1.5mm or 2mm, means a brighter tone and a lighter, fast playing feel. A nice and chunky 3mm and above means a thick earthy tone and a heavy more precise playing feel. We can pretty much manufacture any thickness so the choice is yours!
Secondly, What length would you like it? 
Do you just play individual notes, then perhaps go for a shorter, easier to handle slide. Do you bar all the strings? Then go for a full length slide. Just state what length you would like the slide upon ordering.
Still more decision making!(you want it to be perfect right?!) Do you sometimes find a slide with straight edge feels uncomfortable on your finger? Then perhaps try the Chamfered edge(pictured).
Finally, some cosmetic choices. Do you want your slide to feel like it has had 50 years of playing in sweaty blues clubs in the Deep South? Then try out our Relic'd service! If not, go with our standard finish. The lovely, highly polished style. Will make you want to keep the slide on your finger as a piece of jewellery!

All of our slides come with a free velvet storage bag.

3. Place the order and add your requirements to the notes during the PayPal checkout! Nice & Simple.
Any questions or any further special requirements please don't hesitate to e-mail me using the contact page form :)
